question:
With reference to the recent discussion about the Tishreen Revolution, consider the following statements:
  1. It is a revolution in Iran.
  2. It is also known as the February Revolution.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Â Statement 1 is incorrect: The Tishreen Revolution is an ongoing issue in Iraq. It is reported to have been initiated due to disillusionment with the government corruption, low wages, unemployment, poor public services as well as anti-Iranian and anti-American sentiments among the Iraqi people. Statement 2 is incorrect: It is also called the October revolution as it started in October of 2019. It is also referred to as the Iraqi Intifada. It involves sit-ins, civil disobedience, marches, demonstrations, online activism as well as outright rioting. Recently, the new PM, Allawi was appointed amidst the revolution.
